stages.label: Field Mapping for Inclusion List Suggestions
Exclude Docs with Unwanted Terms
stages.condition:
true
/**
 * Loads in full-list-of-bad-words_csv located in the blob store
 * For each phrase/word in the bad word lists, see if it exists in the value_s field or if the entire word is the value_s field
 * Removes the entire document if matched
 * 
 * Does not run on entity type documents
 */

stages.label: Frequency Threshold Filter
stages.condition:
doc.hasField('signal_count_i')
/* Checks the number of signals generated for each term
 * from the aggregated signal data and removes those
 * below a specified threshold. The threshold is defined
 * by global var threshold
 */

stages.label: Numeric Characters Filter
stages.condition:
true
/* Checks the percentage of numeric characters in the
 * completion term and removes those over a set
 * threshold. The threshold is defined by global var
 * threshold and is expressed as a percentage in
 * decimal form.
 */

stages.label: Normalize Text
stages.condition:
true
/* Lowercases terms and trims leading and trailing
 * whitespace. Any future changes to how suggestions
 * are displayed should also go here
 */

stages.label: Suggestion Term Length Filter
stages.condition:
true
/* Checks the number of words in a suggestion and
 * removes those over a specified threshold. The
 * threshold is set by global var threshold
  */

stages.label: Add ID and Type Fields
Only Return Entity Documents
stages.condition:
request.hasParam("entityOnly") && request.getFirstParam("entityOnly").equals("true");
// This stage is used to the make the results only entity documents. The ${APP}_TYPEAHEAD_DC_entity_QPF will send a entityOnly=true

stages.label: Only Return History Documents
stages.condition:
request.hasParam("historyOnly") && request.getFirstParam("historyOnly").equals("true");
// This stage is used to the make the results only history documents. The ${APP}_TYPEAHEAD_DC_history_QPF will send a parameter historyOnly=true

stages.label: Add Terms to Response
Add response details to response messages

callParams.entity: <root><delete><query>ta_type:history AND (last_updated_tdt:[* TO NOW-10MINUTES] OR (*:* AND -last_updated_tdt:[* TO *]))</query></delete><commit/></root>

sparkJobs.transformSql:
SELECT query_s AS value_s,
  SUM(aggr_count_i) AS signal_count_i,
  current_timestamp() AS last_updated_tdt,
  AVG(weight_d) AS popularity_d
FROM _input
GROUP BY value_s
